0.1.name: wordpress/foghorn
0.1.description: Foghorn is a minimalist theme built off the foundation of Twenty Eleven.  It has a custom options panel for switching layouts, removing sidebars, uploading a logo, backgrounds, and changing footer text.  It's design is responsive, meaning it looks good at any browser width including iPhones and other mobile devices.  View the theme demo at http://themes.wptheming.com/foghorn.
